Introduction

Haku Shota, known under his stage name Soul, is a South Korean-Japanese dancer, rapper, songwriter, and composer under FNC Entertainment. He is best known as a member of the boy group P1Harmony.

On September 16, 2020, Soul was revealed as the second member of P1Harmony. The group officially debuted on October 28, 2020, with their first mini-album "Disharmony : Stand Out".
